title: The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo etc  Swedish Trilogy
description:
This is the famous Swedish trilogy based on a true story.
"MÃ¤n som hatar kvinnor" (original title)
The IMDB SAYS:
A journalist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing -- or dead -- for forty years by a young female hacker

It is overdubbed in English.
It consists of
1) THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO (2009)
2) THE GIRL WHO PLAYED WITH FIRE
3) THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET'S NEST

There is also an American version, only one film, but some of us like the original Swedish 3-film version better. Along time ago, and after much looking, I found all three versions overdubbed in English.

Here they are, for your viewing pleasure.
And as always, please remember to seed if possible, approx. 1 1/2 times what you've downloaded, to keep it going.

I know it's an old film, and some people have already seen it. But for some, it is new as they haven't seen it. 

IMDB says:
 A journalist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing -- or dead -- for forty years by a young female hacker.

Director: Niels Arden Oplev
Writers: Nikolaj Arcel (screenplay), Rasmus Heisterberg (screenplay), 1 more credit Â»
Stars: Michael Nyqvist, Noomi Rapace, Ewa FrÃ¶ling
